Name: Mahmoud
description:
Mahmoud, who appears in the photo, is a hardworking strong man who tries his utmost to help his family live a decent life. He is 36 and lives with his family in Nablus, West Bank.

He is working but his income is low and barely covers his family's basic needs. However, he turned to Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN) to request a loan to buy a solar system to reduce the use of electricity and get hot water. This will enhance his family's living standards.

He hopes you will help by funding his loan.
